Sub-clusters: The Residences (leafy villa clusters), Seventh Heaven apartments
Demographics: High-net-worth families, luxury seekers
Nearby infra: Near Global Village; 15 min to Mall of the Emirates; reputed schools (DKV) nearby
Developer: Abwab (private); initial masterplan by Dubai Properties

Sub-clusters: Barsha 1, 2, 3; Barsha Heights (Tecom)
Demographics: Expat families, professionals (proximity to schools & malls)
Nearby infra: Mall of the Emirates in Barsha 1; many schools (Dubai American Academy etc); Sharaf DG Metro
Developer: Mixed (private builds; Barsha Heights by TECOM)

Sub-clusters: Arabian Ranches 1, 2 (e.g. Saheel, Alvorada, Palmera, etc)
Demographics: Family-oriented expat community
Nearby infra: On-site schools & retail center; near Motor City; 20 min to Mall of Emirates

Sub-clusters: Residential zone around Ain Dubai (observation wheel)
Demographics: Affluent professionals, families; expats seeking resort lifestyle
Nearby infra: Connected to JBR by pedestrian bridge; close to Dubai Marina; on-island retail & Caesars Palace resort

Sub-clusters: Bay Square, Executive Towers, Marasi Drive area
Demographics: Young professionals, business-oriented expats
Nearby infra: Dubai Canal promenade; Business Bay Metro; Dubai Mall 5 min; many hotels and offices in area
Developer: Dubai Properties (master developer); multiple private developers for towers

Sub-clusters: Residential buildings around City Walk mall
Demographics: Upscale professionals, small families; fashion-forward expats
Nearby infra: City Walk shopping & dining at doorstep; 5 min to Downtown; Coca-Cola Arena nearby

Sub-clusters: Burj Khalifa District, Opera District, Old Town, etc.
Demographics: High-income professionals, executive expats, investors
Nearby infra: Landmarks: Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall; Dubai Opera; Metro access; Boulevard dining & hotels

Sub-clusters: Sidra, Maple, Golf Place, etc (villas); Park Heights (apartments)
Demographics: Family-friendly expat community; professionals seeking suburban luxury
Nearby infra: Dubai Hills Mall; on-site golf course; schools & hospital (King's College) within community

Sub-clusters: Marina Walk, JBR end, Marina Gate area, etc.
Demographics: Young professionals, expat couples; vibrant urban lifestyle
Nearby infra: The Beach at JBR; Dubai Marina Mall; Dubai Tram & Metro; waterfront dining along Marina Walk
Developer: Emaar (master developer of core marina); various tower developers

Sub-clusters: Sectors named by letter (Zone E, H, etc around golf course)
Demographics: Ultra-high-net-worth individuals, celebrities
Nearby infra: Montgomerie Golf Club on-site; near Dubai Marina (10min); top schools in Emirates Hills area

Sub-clusters: Themed clusters (England, China, Persia, etc)
Demographics: Singles, couples, small families on a budget
Nearby infra: Dragon Mart Mall in community; close to Academic City & DSO; 15 min to DXB airport

Sub-clusters: 6 clusters (Shams, Amwaj, Rimal, Bahar, Sadaf, Murjan)
Demographics: Beach-loving expats, young families; tourists in vicinity
Nearby infra: The Beach at JBR (retail/dining); direct beach access; adjacent to Dubai Marina; tram stations

Sub-clusters: 26 clusters (A-Z) around 3 lakes
Demographics: Mix of professionals and families; value-conscious expats enjoying modern living
Nearby infra: 2 metro stations within JLT; parks and lakes inside; opposite Dubai Marina; shops and restaurants in each cluster
Developer: DMCC (Master developer); towers by various private developers

Sub-clusters: 10 districts (District 10–19) with parks
Demographics: Popular with families and young professionals
Nearby infra: Circle Mall in community; schools (JSS International) on-site; 10 min to Dubai Marina, 15 min to Mall of Emirates

Sub-clusters: Uptown Mirdif, Shurooq and Ghoroob (apartments)
Demographics: Middle-income expat families; long-term residents
Nearby infra: Mirdif City Centre mall; Uptown Mirdif retail street; near DXB airport (15 min)

Sub-clusters: Fronds (villas), Trunk (apartments), Crescent (resorts)
Avg Price (Sale): Apt ~AED 2–10M; Garden Home villa ~AED 18–30M; Signature Villa 30M+
Demographics: Wealthy investors, celebrities, high net-worth individuals
Nearby infra: On-island Nakheel Mall & Golden Mile retail; private beaches; connected to mainland via bridge & monorail (to Dubai Marina)

Sub-clusters: Silicon Residences, Cedre Villas, Academic City nearby
Demographics: Cost-conscious professionals and families (many tech employees, students)
Nearby infra: Within DSO free zone (tech offices); nearby Dubai Academic City; 20 min to Downtown via major highways

Sub-clusters: Canal Residence, Victory Heights (villa sub-community)
Demographics: Sports enthusiasts, families; mid-income expats
Nearby infra: On-site sports academies (ICC cricket, football); Els Golf Club; 15 min to Mall of the Emirates

Sub-clusters: Hayat, Zahra, Safi, Noor, etc (apartment and townhouse clusters)
Demographics: Young families and first-time buyers/renters
Nearby infra: Town Square Park and retail center in community; 20 min drive to Mall of Emirates; new schools in vicinity (within Dubailand)

Sub-clusters: Umm Suqeim 1, 2, 3 (residential areas along Jumeirah Beach Rd)
Demographics: Wealthy locals and expats; long-term villa residents
Nearby infra: Kite Beach and public beaches; Burj Al Arab and Wild Wadi nearby; local cafes, boutiques along beach road
